content: a basic crocheted scarf that takes little time and a minimal amount of yarn for more giving in a pattern that never goes out of style anyone who can double_crochet should be able to make this scarf however it does involve a chain-free double_crochet foundation it only takes a little practice to get the hang of this fun technique abbreviations us terms * chain = chain * double_crochet = double_crochet * fdc = foundation double_crochet see special stitches materials * 7 oz worsted weight yarn in main color of choice mc * small amount worsted weight yarn in coordinating color cc * size h8/5 00mm crochet hook * yarn needle for weaving in ends
